critique: This document is an executive order withdrawing land from settlement to protect the watershed supplying water to Los Angeles. It is difficult to assess its ideological tilt as it is primarily a practical measure related to resource management. It doesn't directly address immigration, executive power, federalism, national security, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most scores will be neutral. The action of withdrawing land could be seen as a slight increase in federal power, but it's within the scope of existing legislation.
